item.description:
Swing and Foxtrot Class

Tired of sitting and watching others dance and have fun at parties and weddings? Then come learn the basics and look great on the dance floor. Ballroom dancing is fun, great exercise and very sociable. The class will also help prepare you for that special Caribbean Cruise.
Come learn East Coast Swing & enjoy music of the Big Bands and Eight to the Bar; with Foxtrot youâ€™ll glide gracefully down the floor to the classic music of Sinatra, Michael Buble and Rod Stewart.

This one hour class is for all levels, beginners welcome. Partners are suggested but not necessary. Please wear comfortable clothes and shoes that can slide, no sandals. Class size is limited to 30.

Wednesdays, 7:15-8:15pm
5 weeks: Sept. 22-Oct. 20, 2010
Fee: $55/person
$90/couple

Instructor: Laurent Mullen, owner of Ballroom Dancin Fools
203-641-0691
item.how_to_find_us: See Kris at the front desk.
item.name: Swing and Foxtrot class
